item.title: On-campus student workers needed
item.description: The School of Exercise and Sports Sciences is looking for 4 student workers.%0AGet all the details.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Informative meetings on the Erasmus+ call 2025-2026
item.description: Two information sessions are organised for the students regarding the Erasmus+ Studio 2025-2026 call, on the following dates: February 17th 2025 and February 18th 2025. For further details please see the main notice.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: 3 student job vacancies at the SLAM Centre
item.description: The University Language Centre (SLAM) is seeking 2 student workers to help with administrative activities and 1 student worker to help with graphic design projects. Applications are open until 12 noon on 18 February. For further details and to apply, please see the job posting.%0A

item.title: 10th SLAM webinar "How to use and adapt authentic material in English class" ‚Äì 25 February 2025 at 15.00
item.description: Registrations are now open for the webinar "How to use and adapt authentic material in English class", which will be given by Isabella Baldi on 25 February 2025 at 15.00. %0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.description: Applications to open-admission Master‚Äôs degree programmes for the academic year 2025/2026 are open.%0ANon-EU students VISA applicants can apply for admission until 30 April 2025.%0A

item.title: Faculty Championship 2025
item.description: To encourage students to participate in the competitions, classes will be suspended on the following dates: %0A‚Ä¢ Tuesday, 15 April 2025 ONLY for students of the LITA campus in Segrate (from 11 am onwards)%0A%0A‚Ä¢ Wednesday, 21 May 2025 for all students of the Faculty of Medicine (all classes scheduled for the day). %0A%0A
